snippet: Malaysian regulators granted an operating license for a giant rare earth metals refinery that has been at the center of a dispute over radioactive waste management.
abstract: Malaysian regulators grant an operating license for a giant rare earth metals refinery that has been at the center of a dispute over radioactive waste management; Lynas, firm building refinery, must specify a location and submit plans for permanent disposal of waste refinery will produce.
lead_paragraph: Malaysian regulators granted an operating license for a giant rare earth metals refinery that has been at the center of a dispute over radioactive waste management.

headline.main: Rare Earth Plant Cleared To Operate in Malaysia
headline.print_headline: Rare Earth Plant Cleared To Operate in Malaysia
